    • Uses of DotPublisherException in com.dotcms.publisher.ajax

      Methods in com.dotcms.publisher.ajax that throw DotPublisherException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RemotePublishAjaxAction.retry(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Allow the user to send or try to send again failed and successfully sent bundles, in order to do that
      we send the bundle again to que publisher queue job which will try to remote publish again the bundle.
